fields.name: default_cluster
fields.description: Default cluster configuration.

fields.name: is
fields.description: Identity Server configuration.

fields.name: id
fields.description:
Immutable and unique public identifier for the License.
Generated by the License Server.

fields.name: license_issuer_ids
fields.description: Issuer of the license.

fields.name: valid_from
fields.description: The license is not valid before this time.

fields.name: valid_until
fields.description: The license is not valid after this time.

fields.name: warn_for
fields.description: For how long (before valid_until) to warn about license expiry.

fields.name: limit_for
fields.description: For how long (before valid_until) to limit non-critical functionality.

fields.name: min_version
fields.description: If set, sets the minimum version allowed by this license (major.minor.patch).

fields.name: max_version
fields.description: If set, sets the maximum version allowed by this license (major.minor.patch).

fields.name: components
fields.description: If set, only the given components can be started.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: component_address_regexps
fields.description: If set, the server addresses must match any of these regexps.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: dev_addr_prefixes
fields.description: If set, the configured DevAddr prefixes must match any of these prefixes.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: join_eui_prefixes
fields.description: If set, the configured JoinEUI prefixes must match any of these prefixes.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: multi_tenancy
fields.description: Indicates whether multi-tenancy support is included.

fields.name: max_applications
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of applications that can be created.

fields.name: max_clients
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of clients that can be created.

fields.name: max_end_devices
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of end_devices that can be created.

fields.name: max_gateways
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of gateways that can be created.

fields.name: max_organizations
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of organizations that can be created.

fields.name: max_users
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of users that can be created.

fields.name: metering
fields.description: If set, requires checking in with a metering service.

fields.name: license
fields.description: The marshaled License message.

fields.name: signatures
fields.description:
Signatures for the license bytes. The LicenseKey is invalid if it does not
contain any signature with a known key_id or if it contains any invalid
signature.
fields.label: repeated

fields.name: key_id
fields.description: The ID of the key used to sign license.

fields.name: signature
fields.description: Signature for license using the key identified by key_id.

fields.name: extend_valid_until
fields.description: How long the license validity should be extended (relative to the current time) on update.

fields.name: interval
fields.description: How frequently to report to the metering service.

fields.name: on_success
fields.description: How to update the license on success.

fields.name: order
fields.description:
Order the results by this field path (must be present in the field mask).
Default ordering is by ID. Prepend with a minus (-) to reverse the order.

fields.name: limit
fields.description: Limit the number of results per page.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Page number for pagination. 0 is interpreted as 1.

messages.name: Tenant
messages.description: Tenant is the message that defines a Tenant in the network.

fields.name: max_applications
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of applications that can be created.

fields.name: max_clients
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of clients that can be created.

fields.name: max_end_devices
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of end_devices that can be created.

fields.name: max_gateways
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of gateways that can be created.

fields.name: max_organizations
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of organizations that can be created.

fields.name: max_users
fields.description: If set, restricts the maximum number of users that can be created.

fields.name: state
fields.description:
The reviewing state of the tenant.
This field can only be modified by tenant admins.

services.name: Tbs
services.description: The Tbs service manages the Tenant Billing Server metering reporting.

scalarValueTypes.notes: Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers – if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint32 instead.
Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers – if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint64 instead.
Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int32s.
Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int64s.
Always four bytes. More efficient than uint32 if values are often greater than 2^28.
Always eight bytes. More efficient than uint64 if values are often greater than 2^56.
A string must always contain UTF-8 encoded or 7-bit ASCII text.
May contain any arbitrary sequence of bytes.
